title: Bonus Episode - Coercive Control in Dirty John
description:
Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti have a lot more to say about Dirty John; a serial stalker and domestic abuse perpetrator who coercively controls his victims and stalks them on separation. A man who is given the name "Dirty John" is a reflection of his treatment of women; a man who learns his trade craft from a young age and keeps getting away with it. Laura gives further insight and analysis about his behavior, his targeting of victims, Cindi's murder and the high risk factors to serious harm and homicide in domestic abuse and stalking cases. We must learn the lessons and close down perpetrators behavior far earlier on. Listen to the pod to spot the warning signs.


#HerNameWasCindi 

#HerNameISDebraTerraJacquelyn
